comment: I loved her! She was so insightful and made the material easy to understand! I was able to receive A's on papers without going to class that often, but I strongly recommend that you do! She's extremely sweet ,approachable and understanding!

Prof. Khan was an amazing professor. All of the test are just papers. You will be required to do a peace project. You have to buy 3 books (that you will need) so beware of that. Overall an amazing class. It was an elective for me but I changed my major and no longer needed it but I don't regret taking it at all. It was a great class and great prof.

Very sweet lady and very helpful. Participation and attendance really matters in this class. Can be confusing on directions for projects and exams but very helpful every time I've been confused. Not an easy class, you definitely have to put forth the effort, but getting an A isn't hard if you do so. I'd take her again

Dr. Kahn is very sweet, and she is very specific on what assignments are. She does not to test, instead she does essay exams, but she emails the guidelines which are very specific and goes over it the class before it's due. Easy A and you'll learn some good life lessons.

She is an AMAZING professor! Seriously! Her lectures are interesting and brief, followed by class discussion in open forums. She wants the class to teach her as much as she is teaching the students. Her assignments are easy to understand and complete and if you have ANY interest in world culture, dilemmas, and creative problem solving take her!
Stop what you are doing and register. She is amazing. Goes out of her way to be fair and help. Inspiring woman, will take again.

It was a fair class to tell you the truth. Exams were stupid as all you did was summarize every reading which made the papers very, very long. Doesn't hand them back so you won't know what you did wrong to better prepare for the next.

Professor Khan is awesome! She's very easy to talk to and is very helpful when writing papers, which is basically all the class is. Attendance isnt mandatory but its good to go because some of the videos shown relate back to the essays. Definitely take her!!
You will learn peacebuilding methods and you will act upon those methods.
